about.summary: Django Events Timetable is an app component offering easy integration with Django, Django CMS, and Wagtail CMS. It features a user-friendly interface for managing event items, customizable and responsive templates with Dark and Light themes, and a color picker for design personalization. Designed to complement any project seamlessly, it is also extendable and customizable to meet specific needs.

Django Events Timetable is an app component offering easy integration with Django, Django CMS, and Wagtail CMS. It features a user-friendly interface for managing event items, customizable and responsive templates with Dark and Light themes, and a color picker for design personalization. Designed to complement any project seamlessly, it is also extendable and customizable to meet specific needs.

name: django-events-timetable
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-events-timetable" %}
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/django-events-timetable-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5835fd76081cbb2f1cc91bd5a85b2e266c492975d7414571c0f00a8c69cc1558

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - django >=3.0

test:
  imports:
    - django_events_timetable
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/dostogircse171/django_events_timetable
  summary: Django Events Timetable is an app component offering easy integration with Django, Django CMS, and Wagtail CMS. It features a user-friendly interface for managing event items, customizable and responsive templates with Dark and Light themes, and a color picker for design personalization. Designed to complement any project seamlessly, it is also extendable and customizable to meet specific needs.
  dev_url: https://github.com/dostogircse171/django_events_timetable
  license: MIT
  license_file: django_events_timetable/LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706
